item.title: Virus-fuelled online shopping surge
item.description: The coronavirus pandemic has had a huge impact on the shopping habits of Australian consumers, with one in five abandoning cash completely and 15 per cent buying online for the first time.

item.title: ‘Evil’: Anti-masker films his own arrest
item.description: Another anti-masker has filmed himself ranting at police before his arrest, calling the officers “evil” and trying to recite legislation at them.

item.title: Fallout from Victoria’s deadliest day
item.description: A lot happened today in Australia with Victoria reporting a record number of daily coronavirus cases and reaching a new record number of deaths.

item.title: Gordon’s Rockets ready to rule
item.description: Everyone “loves” the Los Angeles Lakers as NBA championship favourites according to Houston guard Eric Gordon, but the sharpshooter says don’t rule out his Rockets.

item.title: ASX in the red but gold stocks shine
item.description: The Australian share market closed in the red, weighed down by record coronavirus numbers in Victoria and rising tensions between the US and China, but gold shares jumped after the price of the precious metal hit a new record.

item.title: Rush to pamper pooches before lockdown
item.description: Dogs across Melbourne will be looking glamorous during the city’s lockdown after a rush of pet parents getting their pooches pampered ahead of six weeks at home.

item.title: ‘I couldn’t look’: Woman dies in fall at QVB
item.description: A woman has fallen to her death at a shopping centre in Sydney’s CBD.

item.title: How a COVID false positive happens
item.description: On a quiet Brisbane street stands one of the most important buildings in Queensland’s defence against COVID-19.

item.title: Scott says COVID break could extend his career
item.description: Adam Scott has revealed he flirted with the idea of not playing again this year as the COVID-19 pandemic brought a halt to the US PGA Tour.

item.title: Teen loses both parents to virus in 4 days
item.description: A high school student is mourning the tragic loss of both his parents after they died from coronavirus just four days apart.
